content: > this pattern for diameter 2 is available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions and photo tutorials without advertisements **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **skill level** advanced beginner - the pattern expects basic knowledge of tunisian crochet and how to make tunisian simple stitches **about the pattern** i had not tried making a continuous spiral using tunisian crochet for the longest time it turns out that it is super easy and so much fun to make this is also a great pattern for people who are just starting to explore tunisian crochet since it can be made with a traditional crochet hook this pattern contains 1 complete list of materials 2 written instructions 3 video tutorials for all stitches and techniques used in this pattern **what you need to know** tunisian simple stitch 3 **sizes** the pattern comes in 6 rug sizes of diameter 2 4 6 8 10 and 12 **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 4 #knitterknotter 5 #madewithknitterknotter 6 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns
